data.name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Hardened Marine Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Hardened Marine Pack includes the following cosmetic items for your Aliens: Fireteam Elite marine:

  • Bandana Head Accessory
  • Digital Red Camo Weapon Color
  • Adios Weapon Decal
  • Endeavor Weapon Decal
  • Flames Weapon Decal
  • "Chestburster" Joke Emote
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The Hardened Marine Pack includes Bandana Head Accessory, Digital Red Camo Weapon Color, 3 Weapon Decals, and "Chestburster" Joke Emote.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Czech, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support
